login

Class LoginController

  • java.lang.Object
    • login.LoginController

  • public class LoginController
extends java.lang.Object
    This scene accesses the database to check if usernameTextField and password are valid. If the user is valid it will promt the user and change the scene depending on the DRIVER column in the USERINFO table value. If user is not valid, there access will be blocked. This scene also allows the user to navigate to the newuser.NewUser.fxml scene so they can create an account to sign in. Date 10/23/2018.
